titleStmt.title: A briefe dialogue, concerning preparation for the worthy receiuing of the Lords Supper. Taken, for the most part, out of the ten sermons of Mr I. Dod, and Mr. R. Cleaver, touching that subiect
titleStmt.author: Dod, John, 1549?-1645.
Dod, John, 1549?-1645. Ten sermons tending chiefely to the fitting of men for the worthy receiving of the Lords Supper.
Cleaver, Robert, 1561 or 2-ca. 1625. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by I. B[eale]. for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop neere Fleete Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Reprints part of "Ten sermons tending chiefely to the fitting of men for the worth receiving of the Lords Supper" by John Dod and Robert Cleaver.
Running title reads: A dialogue of preparation to the Lords Supper.
Reproduction of original in the British Library, London, England.
